article.title: Trade Agreement Compliance Successes by Region
article.summary: Get links to Trade Agreement Compliance Program Success Stories by Region.
article.content:
Successes by Region

Asia

  • China: For a Small Pennsylvania Company, ITA Program Helps Assure an International Sale (August 2011)
    China: ITA Facilitates an Open Bidding Process for China's 3G Networks (December 2012)
  • India: Ohio's Diebold Gains Duty Free Access to India's $100+ Million IT Market (September 2012)
  • Japan: ITA helps California Company Overcome Japanese Trade Barrier (February 2012)
  • Japan: ITA assists Chart Industries enter Japanese Market (February 2013)
  • Japan: Commerce Opens Doors to U.S. Elevators in Japan (April 2013)
  • Japan: ITA Ensures a Level Playing Field for ICT Services in Japan (June 2013)
  • Japan: ITA Assists U.S. Chemical Manufacturers with Protecting Confidential Business Information in Japan (August 2013)
  • Korea: ITA Helps End Burdensome Re-Registration Requirements on Medical Devices in Korea (May 2013)
  • Korea: ITA Helps Maintain Market Access for U.S. Companies in the Korean Cosmetics Industry (April 2013)
  • Taiwan: Swift Response by ITA Team Secures Open Market in Taiwan (November 2011)
  • Thailand: U.S. Distilled Spirits Companies Win Resolution of Customs Valuation Concerns in Thailand (January 2012)
  • Vietnam: ITA Helps Alleviate Against Import Restrictions on Consumer Goods in Vietnam (August 2013)

Europe

  • European Union: ITA Overcomes Costly EU Regulation (January 2012)
  • European Union: ITA Helps California Company Reduce the Costs of Exporting to Europe (June 2013)
  • Russia: ITA Helps U.S. Sporting Goods Manufacturer Regain Ownership of its Trademark in Russia (July 2013)
  • Turkey: ITA Ensures Streamlined Import Licensing Procedures for Distilled Spirits in Turkey (June 2013)
  • Turkey: Garmin Marine Navigation GPS Units Navigate Turkish Customs (March 2012)

Africa and Middle East

  • Bahrain: Harley-Davidson, the Motorcycle Manufacturer, Overcomes Bahrain Trade Barrier (April 2011)
  • Egypt: ITA Ensures the Recall of Counterfeit Sporting Goods in Egypt (June 2013)
  • Oman: ITA Ensures Patent Rights Protection in Oman (February 2013)

Western Hemisphere and South America

  • Chile: ITA Utilizes Free Trade Agreement to Ensure Proper Customs Valuation and Appeal Procedures in Chile (April 2013)
  • Chile: ITA Leverages U.S.-Chilean FTA for Small Californian Company (October 2012)
  • Chile: ITA Secures Market Access for Navistar Trucks in Chile (January 2013)
  • El Salvador: ITA Ensures Smooth Supply of Papa John's Products to El Salvador (August 2013)
  • Mexico: ITA Ensures Access for U.S. Pipe Producer in the Mexican Market (February 2014)
article.seometadatatitle: Trade Agreement Compliance Successes by Region
article.seometadatadescription: Get links to Trade Agreement Compliance Program Success Stories by Region.
article.seometadatakeyword: International Sales, Trade Barriers, Customs, Trade Agreements, Compliance
